name: Janda Exercise Sandals
descr: Developed by Prof. Dr. Vladimir Janda. The third and most progressive challenge, exercise sandals, introduce instability while walking. Under approiate clinical supervision, the patient takes small steps with the sandals. The effort required to maintain balance subconsciously activates the gluteal muscles and stabilizes muscles of the pelvis. Exercise sandals features an adjustable strap and rubber hemisphere on the base of the cork sandal.
